inputFile.description: Input SQL file. Converter uses this data as a source

outputFile.description: Result output file. Converter writes data to this file

handlers.description: Every handler applies to every input file line and generate output file lines if possible

name.description: Handler name. Uses to improve readability during converter config editing and to show progress while converting

filter.description: Regex filter. Uses to skip some lines which does not fit the 'pattern' regex

pattern.description: Regex pattern. Uses filter input file lines and extract regex groups for 'substitution'

substitution.description: Regex substitution. Uses to build a output file lines. The 'pattern' regex groups are available here
